title: Bug 120315: Display property 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the expected behavior is for the item to be hidden in the generated PDF. However, the item is still visible even though the display property is set to 'none'.
EB: When previewing the generated PDF, the expected result is that the item with the display property set to 'none' should disappear, indicating that it is not visible in the PDF.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Open the new PDF emitter.
2. Set the display property of an item to 'none'.
3. Preview the generated PDF.
4. Observe that the item is still visible in the PDF, despite having the display property set to 'none'.
